namespace  sys

Detailed Description

Runtime, system-independent process creation API.

When it comes to multitasking, we almost all prefer threads to heritage process calls. However, threads and processes are almost never equivalent. Sometimes we need a process. Here we define a simple API for process creation in a system-independent manner
